text: What do you want me to do? You just want me to hit you?
Come on, do me this one favor.
Why?
Why? I don't know why, I don't know. Never been in a fight. You?
No, but that- that's a good thing.
No, it is not. How much can you know about yourself if you've never been in a fight?
I don't wanna die without any scars.
Just come on. Hit me before I lose my nerve.

-Ah, God... this is crazy. I don't kno--
-So go crazy. Let 'er rip.
Hey, I don't know about this.
I don't either, but who gives a shit? No one's watching. What do you care?
Wait, wha-- this is crazy. You want me to hit you?
That's right.
Wha- like, in the face?
Surprise me.
This is so fucking stupid...
Motherfucker!
You hit me in the ear!
Well, Jesus, I'm sorry!
Ow, Christ! Why the ear, man?

-I fucked it up, kinda.
-No, that was perfect.
That really hurts.
Right?
Hit me again.
No, you hit me. Come on!
We should do this again some time.
